message:
SYSTEM: Presentacion_OEG24-04-2014.pdf: Página 9
My thesis hypothesis 
Given an RDF dataset, potentially huge, a lightweight binary RDF 
can encode the data leveraging the skewed structure of RDF graphs 
for the purposes of  
 
1.
Large spatial savings,  
2.
easy and modular data-centric publication and parsing and  
3.
data retrieval. 
 
Applications: 
• Publish a large dataset on the Web. 
• Transfer between two servers. 
• Distributed RDF Data Management. 
• Fast In-Memory Query Engine. 
 
 
 
 
9
speaker: SYSTEM
